data.fullContent: The carpenter did a poor job of constructing the new set of shelves for the formal dining room. Although he attempted to make the surface level with the floor, the shelves tilted so that objects rolled right off on them. There were essentially non-functional, and clearly served no real aesthetic purpose.
data.answer: 木匠为正式的餐厅建造新架子的工作做得很差。尽管他试图使书架的表面与地板平齐，但书架是倾斜的，所以物体可以直接滚到上面。它们本质上没有功能，显然也没有真正的审美目的。
